author: Tenzin Gyatso
message: When we feel love and kindness toward others, it not only makes others feel loved and cared for, but it helps us also to develop inner happiness and peace.
title: Thought of the day

author: Maya Angelou
message: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
title: Thought of the day
